Banner.Description: A committed MEAN stack developer with 2+ years of experience shaping systems, interfaces to elevate the digital realm. Proficient in Angular and Django , my focus is on producing clean, reusable, and scalable code that adheres to best practices and development standards. My journey involves a passion for continuous improvement and innovation within the MEAN stack. Let's collaborate to create cutting-edge solutions and contribute to making the web a more dynamic and efficient space.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 2+ years as a developer, I sought to train every day. I specialize in Micro Frontend Technologies, Angular Custom Libraries , and robust unit testing. I seamlessly integrate continuous processes and have hands-on experience with Micro-Services backend.

Beyond technical skills, I excel in leadership, fostering teamwork with empathy and motivation. My focus extends to system improvements, site optimization, and implementing innovative ideas that enhance project value. Let's collaborate to elevate projects in the dynamic realm of the MEAN stack and Micro-Services backend, pushing boundaries and delivering impactful solutions!
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Developer
Description: Developed and maintained web-based application's using Angular, Django, and MySQL, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented multiple Plugin's to support multiple applications, using Angular Libraries.
Aeeset DevOps team for the Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Working in team of 26 people and leading a team of 2 Junior Developer's.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Engineer
Description: Developed and maintained web-based application's using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented multiple Plugin's to support multiple applications, using Angular Libraries.
Aeeset DevOps team for the Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Working in team of 16 people and leading a team of 4 Junior Developer's.
Useing Git, AWS Codecommit for Version Controlling.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular developer
Description: Developed and maintained web applications using Angular.
Integrated REST API's with Web application using HTTP modules.
Developed custom complex reactive forms for colleting user responses.
Improved website performance by optimizing images and implementing caching techniques.
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences
Worked in the team of 8 seniour's Devloper's.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Developed different website's for client's accross the world.
Design layout with HTML, CSS, SASS, Bootstrap, Angular Material's etc.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Involvement in Ongoing and Completed Projects:
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-Retail Point
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Next Generation Cloud based E-Retail System application made from scratch with Micro Frontend Technologie's, role based setting's and user management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Flyaway Hub
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Flyaway Hub is a cloud-based management information system (MIS). Flexibly designed according to the demanding needs of the Aviation Industry . Letting you easily manage your resources and schedule in a secure environment.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: IntelligentForms
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: IntelligentForms is for the Dental Practices accross UK that are future-oriented, brand conscious, customer-focused, providing effective clinical processes, and aligned with staff’s happiness, IntelligentForms Pro is the best solution.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Three Oaks Behavioral Health & Wellness
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Three Oaks is a team of deeply passionate, highly skilled, and intensively trained providers that believe therapy is a process of growth & self-discovery, thus making the experience uniquely yours.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
